scripts.build: npm run build:client && npm run build:server
scripts.build:client: npm run build:client:iife && npm run build:client:cjs
scripts.build:client:iife: cat src/Adobe-SDKs/VisitorAPI.js src/Adobe-SDKs/AppMeasurement.js src/AdobeKit-dev.js > dist/AdobeClientSideKit.esm.js; BUILD=client_iife rollup --config rollup.config.js; rm dist/AdobeClientSideKit.esm.js; cp dist/AdobeClientSideKit.iife.js AdobeKit.js
scripts.build:client:cjs: cat src/Adobe-SDKs/VisitorAPI.js src/Adobe-SDKs/AppMeasurement.js src/AdobeKit-dev.js > dist/AdobeClientSideKit.esm.js; BUILD=client_cjs rollup --config rollup.config.js; rm dist/AdobeClientSideKit.esm.js
scripts.build:server: npm run build:server:iife && npm run build:server:cjs
scripts.build:server:iife: cat src/Adobe-SDKs/VisitorAPI.js src/AdobeServerSideKit-dev.js > dist/AdobeServerSideKit.esm.js; BUILD=server_iife rollup --config rollup.config.js; rm dist/AdobeServerSideKit.esm.js; cp dist/AdobeServerSideKit.iife.js AdobeServerSideKit.js
scripts.build:server:cjs: cat src/Adobe-SDKs/VisitorAPI.js src/AdobeServerSideKit-dev.js > dist/AdobeServerSideKit.esm.js; BUILD=server_cjs rollup --config rollup.config.js; rm dist/AdobeServerSideKit.esm.js
scripts.test: npm run test:client && npm run test:server
